title: Systems Software Engineering Manager, Platform Architecture
summary: Imagine what you can do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job, and there’s no telling what we can accomplish together.
description: Apple’s Platform Architecture group is looking for a talented and experienced technical software engineering manager...
key_qualifications: Experience managing a systems/low level software development team, Proven track record of successful and timely software product delivery with complex dependencies, Demonstrated innovative, critical thinking and troubleshooting skills, Excellent collaborative skills including written and verbal communication, History of motivating teams to meet aggressive goals and innovate, Genuine passion for low-level system engineering and hardware/software integration, Excellent programming (C++/C) and scripting skills (Python). Assembly experience a plus, Proficiency with debugging large, complex system software, Experience developing and shipping low level system software, Strong knowledge of simulation, ARM and X86 ISAs, SoCs, Operating Systems internals, device drivers and boot code.
education_experience: BS with 10+ years experience. Degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering preferred
